mapper.insert: insert into pos_doctor(docnum, num, doclicensename, docpath, docserial, docrecord, doctorcontent) values(pos_doctor_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6})
mapper.update: update pos_doctor SET doclicensename = #{param1}, docpath = #{param2}, docserial = #{param3}, docrecord = #{param4}, doctorcontent = #{param5} where docnum = #{param6}
